title: Chuck

properties.name: description
properties.value: Chuck was a certer in RuneScape Classic, who could provide certificates for logs. Most certers were not converted to RuneScape 2 as they were replaced by the bank note system. For some unknown reason, Chuck was included in the RuneScape 2 beta files. His house can still be found north of the bank in East Ardougne.

content:
This article is about the certer from RuneScape Classic. For the 20th Anniversary event NPC, see Chuck (20th Anniversary event).
 This article contains information obtained from the game APIs or cache.
The content may not be currently accessible in game, or may be reserved for use in a future update.
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Chuck (certer)The RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Chuck
Chuck
Released8 May 2002 (Update)
Removal29 March 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationEast Ardougne
GenderMale
ExamineHe's a lumberjack, and he's ok.
Advanced data
NPC ID3303

Chuck was a certer in RuneScape Classic, who could provide certificates for logs. Most certers were not converted to RuneScape 2 as they were replaced by the bank note system. For some unknown reason, Chuck was included in the RuneScape 2 beta files. His house can still be found north of the bank in East Ardougne.

Chuck was almost certainly never actually added to RuneScape 2, since he lacks any chathead or options. However, he appeared in Old School RuneScape in the 20th Anniversary event, with an appearance more closely matching his design in RuneScape Classic.

The house and lumberyard north of Ardougne, formerly Chuck's.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His examine is almost identical to that of Lumberjack Leif. Both are references to The Lumberjack Song by Monty Python.

'''Chuck''' was a certer in ''RuneScape Classic'', who could provide certificates for logs. Most certers were not converted to ''RuneScape 2'' as they were replaced by the [[bank note]] system. For some unknown reason, Chuck was included in the RuneScape 2 beta files. His house can still be found north of the bank in [[East Ardougne]].

Chuck was almost certainly never actually added to ''RuneScape 2'', since he lacks any chathead or options. However, he appeared in ''Old School RuneScape'' in the [[20th Anniversary event]], with an appearance more closely matching his design in ''RuneScape Classic''.

[[File:Chuck House.png|300px|thumb|left|The house and lumberyard north of Ardougne, formerly Chuck's.]]

==Trivia==
*His examine is almost identical to that of [[Lumberjack Leif]]. Both are references to [[wikipedia:The Lumberjack Song|The Lumberjack Song]] by [[wikipedia:Monty Python|Monty Python]].
